attributes.action: Force Railtrack to stop illegally preventing smoking on Train Platforms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smoking is now banned at all railway stations, even on platforms which are not enclosed public places. People should be allowed to smoke on railtrack property if they are not in an enclosed or semi-enclosed space as per the law. Railtrack introduced this rule with no public consultation despite being publically funded. This is a clear breach of human rights.
